upcomingEvents.title: Official Ground Breaking Ceremony
upcomingEvents.subtitle: Historic Milestone
upcomingEvents.description: Join us for the official groundbreaking ceremony of our new Islamic school in South Edmonton. A significant milestone bringing together families, community leaders, and supporters to witness the official start of construction.
upcomingEvents.location: New Centre Construction Site, South Edmonton
upcomingEvents.significance: This moment marks the beginning of an exciting new chapter for our growing community, establishing a thriving centre of learning, faith, and community.
